name: Debullpost2pdf
author: Debullient

sections.description:
POST 2 PDF is a tool for user and visiters to download a page or post as a pdf docmunet by cliak of a button with great ease.

Looak at our Demo

Features

  • Add PDF button in posts (including custom post types) and pages.
  • Configure PDF header and footer, add custom logo, custom CSS and more.
  • Copy plugin templates in your theme for PDF customizations.
  • Multiple shortcodes: [debullpost2pdf-button], [debullpost2pdf-pagebreak], [debullpost2pdf-remove], and more..
  • Add custom fonts to the PDF.

Documentation

  • See Documentation

Credits

Thanks to:

mPDF, PHP class which generates PDF files from UTF-8 encoded HTML
https://mpdf.github.io/

Font Awesome, the iconic font and CSS toolkit
http://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/
sections.installation:
“POST 2 PDF” is very easy to install. There are methods to do it.

First Method:
1. Search for “POST 2 PDF” via the “Plugins > Add New”
2. Click on “Install Now” button
3. When installation is complete, click on Activate to activate the Plugin

Second Method:
1. Download the plugin as zip file from WordPress.org
2. Upload the downloaded ZIP file via ‘Plugins > Add New > Upload’ screen in your WordPress dashboard
3. Go to Installed Plugins and activate Debullpost2pdf

short_description: Post to PDF on click of a button.
